file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Bank Application API
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /account:
    summary: Banking Api
    description: This API is related to accessing account resource
    post:
      summary: Create an account
      description: This API provides a way to create an account
      operationId: 'createAccount'
      tags:
        - account
      requestBody:
        # because there is a bug which doesn allow to use `$ref` in request body
        # https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator/issues/7922
         content:
           application/json:
             schema:
               type: object
               properties:
                 name:
                   type: string
                 accountType:
                   type: string
                 residencyStatus:
                   type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Response on creating the account
          $ref: '#/components/responses/accountCreationResponse'

components:
  responses:
    accountCreationResponse:
      description: Response on creating the account
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              name:
                type: string
              accountType:
                type: string
              accountId:
                type: string
  requestBodies:
    accountCreation:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              name:
                type: string
              accountType:
                type: string
              residencyStatus:
                type: string
